entry.title: Monday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 16.

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 7. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries early in the afternoon. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h in the afternoon. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 24 in the morning and minus 14 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Monday 10 April 2023
